name: Behind Closed Doors
description:
🗝️ Behind Closed Doors is my university game design project. Designed and developed using Unity and Blender. The game follows our unknowing protagonist, Bluebeard's new bride, as she walks through her new home, piecing together stories each room has to tell. The stories unravel a dark truth. 

[Warning: Spoiler Below]

 . 

. 

. 

.

. 

🔸Behind Closed Doors is a serious game, touching on themes of domestic abuse and violence. Based on the original tale by Charles Perrault, the narrative was rewritten to bring awareness to these issues and the importance of sharing stories to break the cycle of oppressive abuse.🔸
